content.user_title: Build Claude Code agents with proven templates
content.value_statement: You need reliable agent definitions and triggering rules for Claude Code plugins. This skill provides structured templates, examples, and validation steps for consistent agents.
actual_capabilities: Explains required frontmatter fields and validation rules for agents
Provides system prompt design patterns and templates
Includes a shell script to validate agent file structure
Shows triggering example formats with commentary guidance
Gives AI assisted agent creation prompt templates
limitations: Does not generate agent files automatically
Does not run tests or execute agents
Does not integrate with external repositories or APIs
Does not provide a full plugin deployment workflow

prompt_templates.title: Triggering examples
prompt_templates.prompt: Write three <example> blocks for a code review agent, including context, user, assistant, commentary, and trigger response.

prompt_templates.title: System prompt design
prompt_templates.scenario: You need a structured system prompt
prompt_templates.prompt: Draft a system prompt for a test generator agent with responsibilities, process steps, quality standards, and output format.

prompt_templates.title: AI assisted creation
prompt_templates.prompt: Give the JSON output format and guidance for the agent creation prompt, including identifier, whenToUse, and systemPrompt fields.

output_examples.input: Summarize the required frontmatter fields for a Claude Code agent.
output: Name is required and must be lowercase with hyphens
Description must include triggering conditions and examples
Model must be inherit, sonnet, opus, or haiku
Color must be one of the supported UI colors
Tools are optional and should be least privilege

best_practices: Include two to four clear triggering examples in description
Write system prompts in second person with defined output format
Validate agent files with the provided script before testing
anti_patterns: Granting unnecessary tool access by default
Omitting output format or process steps

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. The guidance is designed for Claude Code plugin agents and applies to Claude workflows.

faq.question: What are the limits of the validation script?
faq.answer: It checks structure and fields only. It does not test agent behavior or triggering in runtime.

faq.question: How do I integrate with Codex workflows?
faq.answer: Use the templates to build agent files, then add them to your plugin agents directory.

faq.question: Does this skill handle data safety?
faq.answer: It provides best practices only. You must ensure your agents follow your data handling policies.

faq.question: What if my agent does not trigger?
faq.answer: Improve examples and commentary, and align them with real user phrasing and context.

faq.question: How does this compare to generic prompt guides?
faq.answer: This is tailored to Claude Code agent files, frontmatter rules, and triggering examples.
